alert.note: Alert for Brown; McCulloch; San Saba (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 8:10PM CDT until May 19 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BROWN...NORTHEASTERN MCCULLOCH AND NORTHWESTERN SAN SABA COUNTIES... At 809 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Whon, or near Mercury, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Placid around 820 PM CDT. Mercury and Winchell around 830 PM CDT. Elm Grove around 850 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Milburn and Hall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
